------------ Game Setup ------------
Supply cards: Chancellor, Shanty Town, Baron, Nomad Camp, Scout, Spy, Contraband, Governor, Adventurer, Expand, Copper, Silver, Gold, Estate, Duchy, Province, Curse
Veni-Vedi-Vici - starting cards: Estate, Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
Conqueror Bot - starting cards: Estate, Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
Lord Bottington - starting cards: Estate, Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
Veni-Vedi-Vici - shuffles deck
Conqueror Bot - shuffles deck
Lord Bottington - shuffles deck
Veni-Vedi-Vici - draws Copper, Copper, Estate, Estate, Copper
Conqueror Bot - draws Copper, Estate, Copper, Copper, Estate
Lord Bottington - draws Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Estate
 
---------- Conqueror Bot: turn 1 ----------
Conqueror Bot - plays 3 Copper
Conqueror Bot - buys Silver
Conqueror Bot - gains Silver
Conqueror Bot - draws Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
 
---------- Lord Bottington: turn 1 ----------
Lord Bottington - plays 3 Copper
Lord Bottington - buys Silver
Lord Bottington - gains Silver
Lord Bottington - draws Copper, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper
 
---------- Veni-Vedi-Vici: turn 1 ----------
Veni-Vedi-Vici - plays 3 Copper
Veni-Vedi-Vici - buys Shanty Town
Veni-Vedi-Vici - gains Shanty Town
Veni-Vedi-Vici - draws Copper, Copper, Copper, Estate, Copper
 
---------- Conqueror Bot: turn 2 ----------
Conqueror Bot - plays 4 Copper
Conqueror Bot - buys Baron
Conqueror Bot - gains Baron
Conqueror Bot - shuffles deck
Conqueror Bot - draws Estate, Silver, Copper, Copper, Estate

Lord Bottington - gains Silver

Veni-Vedi-Vici - gains Province
Veni-Vedi-Vici - draws Estate, Province, Province, Province, Gold
 
------------ Game Over ------------
Veni-Vedi-Vici - cards: 4 Governor, 2 Shanty Town, 1 Baron, 1 Expand, 1 Nomad Camp, 7 Copper, 4 Gold, 3 Silver, 6 Province, 2 Estate, 1 Duchy
Veni-Vedi-Vici - total victory points: 41
Veni-Vedi-Vici - turns: 13
 
Conqueror Bot - cards: 2 Baron, 1 Governor, 7 Copper, 6 Silver, 3 Gold, 6 Estate, 3 Province, 2 Duchy
Conqueror Bot - total victory points: 30
Conqueror Bot - turns: 13
 
Lord Bottington - cards: 2 Adventurer, 1 Governor, 9 Silver, 7 Copper, 3 Gold, 3 Province, 3 Estate
Lord Bottington - total victory points: 21
Lord Bottington - turns: 13
 
1st place: Veni-Vedi-Vici
2nd place: Conqueror Bot
3rd place: Lord Bottington
